column1: Finance and Big Data Analytics MSc
column5: Do you want to work in the financial firms of the future where big data is king?The MSc in Finance and Big Data Analytics at Swansea University is designed to pair the key areas of finance and business analytics. This programme takes a data driven approach to analysis of financial markets and organisational information. The degree in Finance and Big Data Analytics covers the key principles of finance, financial modelling and financial markets to prepare you for a dynamic career in finance, banking and a range of other sectors.You don’t need a background in accounting, finance or business to study this one year conversion course. It’s designed to enhance your undergraduate study and accelerate you into your chosen profession anywhere in the world.
column7: Please visit our website for the Finance and Big Data Analytics course fee information.
